column5: I saw a big OFC sign and an OFC bass boat on Sturgeon lake this past weekend (July 8th and 9th). I didnt see anything on this board about it, and I cant see OFC standing for anything else in fishing world.  They were staying at Fish N rest resort cottages.
There is another OFC (Ontario Fishing Club) on facebook.
There is another OFC (Ontario Fishing Club) on facebook. Yes and I won't go there as they are a joke to say the least...
Yeah i agree with GBW stay right away from Ontario Fishing Club on Facebook nothing but bad news.
Any explanation as to why you would say that? I can't say I agree or disagree, but I do follow their page and don't see what the issue is?  S.
Any explanation as to why you would say that? I can't say I agree or disagree, but I do follow their page and don't see what the issue is?  S. Would also like an explanation
All i am going to say is to ask around the fishing community as i am not the o ly one that feels this way
This is the fishing community. I don't think it's fair to slam an entire group without explanation.
This is the fishing community. I don't think it's fair to slam an entire group without explanation. Well said!

Well I think they could have chosen a slightly different name and wonder if it was an attempt to capitalize on the popularity of the OFC logo, pretty smart from a commercial stand point. Apart from that I really don't see any issues but then again I haven't had any involvement with them.

Its not the group itself that is bad news it are the ones that run the group i was actually talking about. If people only knew what actually goes on but not my place to say so like i say ask around you never know what you will learn

Oh didnt know there was another group. They had a nice bass boat with the logo on it. Seemed like a lot of people were at this event, cant be all that bad news if they had a lot of people out for a weekend of fishing.
If you have something to say and proof that what you say is true then you should say it, otherwise your comments don't hold much value.
Like Albert says "hey look, a can of worms, let's open it."
Just dont like how they treated some kids with some of the comments they made
